title: U.N. chief says countries need to rise to challenge of climate change
text:
April 10, 2018 / 3:41 AM / Updated 16 hours ago U.N. chief says countries need to rise to challenge of climate change Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BOAO, China (Reuters) - U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Tuesday that countries need to rise to the challenge of climate change. BEIJING, CHINA - APRIL 08: United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres meets with Chinese state councilor Yang Jiechi (not pictured) at Zhongnanhai on April 8, 2018 in Beijing, China. Lintao Zhang/Pool via Reuters 
Guterres, speaking at the Chinese Boao Forum for Asia on Hainan island, said that while globalization had helped reduce poverty, vast numbers of people had been left behind and he wanted a fairer outcome. Reporting by Kevin Yao; writing by Beijing Monitoring Desk
